channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #187, including every tabletop rpg project started between 12/12 and 01/02
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #187, including every tabletop rpg project started between 12/12 and 01/02. I hope you’ve had good time during the Holidays and a happy New Year celebration. Now, let’s get through the rpg projects who were live during those days or were of to a fast crowdunding start in 2022. German Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game English Crowdfundings 3 Roleplaying Games 2 Spirit & Ghost Roleplaying Games 1 Setting 2 Sourcebooks 2 Adventure 3 D&D 5E Adventure 6 Dice Projects 4 Map Projects 1 Webcomic 2 Various RPG Projects Spanish Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game Italian Crowdfundings 1 Roleplaying Game Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/01/02/crowdfunding-collection-187/

item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #187, including every tabletop rpg project started between 12/12 and 01/02
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #187, including every tabletop rpg project started between 12/12 and 01/02.

I hope you’ve had good time during the Holidays and a happy New Year celebration. Now, let’s get through the rpg projects who were live during those days or were of to a fast crowdunding start in 2022.

German Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

English Crowdfundings

3 Roleplaying Games
2 Spirit & Ghost Roleplaying Games
1 Setting
2 Sourcebooks
2 Adventure
3 D&D 5E Adventure
6 Dice Projects
4 Map Projects
1 Webcomic
2 Various RPG Projects

Spanish Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

Italian Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/01/02/crowdfunding-collection-187/
